data.text:
Disney+ Hotstar is Indiaâs go-to video streaming app for the best of LIVE cricket, the biggest blockbusters, exclusive Hotstar Specials, most-watched TV serials and non-stop regional entertainment. Also get access to the world of Disney, Pixar, Marvel, Star Wars and National Geographic. On Disney+ Hotstar, thereâs something for everyone and every mood.

What you'll love on Hotstar:

A. LIVE Sports

Watch ACC Women's Asia Cup 2024 and more, LIVE! Enjoy a superlative cricket viewing experience with our Commentary Feed and detailed Scorecards.

Some of the other popular tournaments on Disney+ Hotstar are Premier League 2023-24, Pro Kabaddi League 2023-24 & Wimbledon 2024

B. Blockbuster Movies

Watch Indian movies from our curated library of bollywood blockbusters, original movies, regional hits, evergreen favourites, documentaries and critically acclaimed films across languages.

If you subscribe to Hotstar via iTunes, payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase and your membership will automatically renew unless turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Subscription will be renewed within 24-hours before the end of each period at the rate of your selected plan. Turn off auto-renewal anytime through iTunes.

Privacy policy: https://www.hotstar.com/privacy-policy

This is a release that is going to make you look up - a major upgraded experience is here for you. We have been listening to you and we have made the app experience more immersive, delightful, and easier to use.

Immersive visuals with a focus on the worldâs best stories

Decide what to watch with more info and an easier way to navigate episodes

Watch immersively and change episodes without leaving the video player

Manage everything about you in âMy Spaceâ

Dedicated tab for you to search faster

Praneetkaur ,

Not user friendly

The content they have is good but how the new updates on app have disrupted it the entire ott experience is worst. Iâd also written to the hotstar team to bring back the watchlist option which was on the previous version on app that allows a user to add individual episodes to the watchlist. That was very simple and easier way to navigate through any particular episode. But after the new update that came in March, this feature has been disabled. You can now only add the entire series of any show to the watchlist but not particular episodes. With every update on the app in apple store, the team very conveniently write that âwe are listening to youâ¦â are you guys actually listening? These apps are made to give us entertainment, we are charged for the quality of app, content. App updates are made to fix bugs, issues ,not to distrupt the user experience, which you guys have been doing since almost 6 months. And doing a fab job in spoiling the experience ðð». All the more worst experience is while navigating through episodes, the entire list just doesnât open. Please explain how do you move forward or backwards to pick up from where we left the series? Your team has all the screenshots of the issues I have addressed, please do your homework and then come back with a resolution, âliterallyâ. High time you should genuinely start listening to your users!

Developer Response ,

Hi! Thank you for being honest with us! Please share your feedback here: scroll a couple of times on the home page of the app & click on the "Share Feedback" option & share your detailed feedback along with your number. This will help us improve.
